dcterms:creator: J. Fierrez
J. Ortega-Garcia
D. T. Toledano
J. Gonzalez-Rodriguez
dcterms:description: A multimodal dataset containing fingerprint, frontal face and iris images, as well as voice utterances. The entire dataset has 3,200 NIR iris images from 25 subjects with resolution of 640 × 480 pixels, however, due to the available segmentation masks, we use only the first 400 images.
dcterms:title: BioSec

dcterms:creator: T. Tan
Z. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset with 2,639 NIR iris images from 249 subjects with extremely clear iris texture details and resolution of 320 × 280 pixels, acquired in an indoor environment.
dcterms:title: CasiaI3

dcterms:creator: T. Tan
Z. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 20,000 NIR images from 1,000 subjects, collected in an indoor environment with different lighting setups. For our experiments, we manually labeled the first 1,000 images from 50 subjects.
dcterms:title: CasiaT4

dcterms:creator: A. Kumar
A. Passi
dcterms:description: A dataset with 2,240 NIR images acquired from 224 subjects between 14-55 years comprising of 176 males and 48 females. All images have a resolution of 320 × 240 pixels and were obtained in an indoor environment.
dcterms:title: IITD-1

dcterms:creator: H. Proenc¸a
L. A. Alexandre
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of 3,840 images from 120 subjects. The images were captured with a dual spectrum sensor (NIR and VIS) and divided into three subsets: iris, masked periocular and ocular images. We manually labeled the first 1,000 VIS images from the iris subset.
dcterms:title: CrEye-Iris

dcterms:creator: M. Marsico
M. Nappi
D. Riccio
H. Wechsler
dcterms:description: A dataset with 3,191 VIS images captured from 92 subjects under uncontrolled settings using three mobile devices. The images have various resolutions and we used the ground truth masks made available by Hu et al. and labeled another 431 to complete 1,000 images from 75 subjects.
dcterms:title: MICHE-I

dcterms:creator: H. Proenc¸a
L. A. Alexandre
dcterms:description: A subset of the NICE.I dataset composed of 500 images for training and 500 for testing. However, the test set provided by the organizers of the NICE.I contest has only 445 images.
dcterms:title: NICE.I
